title: #208: 'Merica with Lee Camp
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. Welcome to our inaugural 4th of July episode that we will be dong every year until the Nuclear Apocalypse happens which should be any day now. So to celebrate 'Merica I decided to bring the most American MoFu I know on as a guest for this show, the one and only Mr Lee Camp! Please enjoy this fun festive episode as we discover that Mr. Camp is slowly becoming a full blown conspiracy theorist. Serpent Over Eagle, mother fuckers! Happy 4th of July my friends!

Please check out Lee Camp's new comedy special...
https://www.leecampcomedyspecial.com

Thank you to our sponsors:
Blue Chew; Right now, we’ve got a special deal for our listeners: Visit BlueChew.com and get your first shipment FREE when use our special promo code HAT -- Just pay $5 shipping. Again, that’s B - L - U - E - CHEW dot com, promo code HAT to try it FREE.

AbsoluteXracts: Check out our sponsors at ABX.org! They are the Nike of weed and have everything you might need to get lit as f@ck!

BETDSI: Go to BETDSI.com and use the promocode HAT100 and they will double your deposit.

We have big shows coming please check them dates out:
July 6th: The Rec Room in Huntington Beach
Sept 13th: Cobbs in San Fran
